EmailTemplate.subject: Win a TurboStack Homelab! Drawing May 1st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=03182016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Don't miss your chance to enter to win this month's TurboStack home lab, the drawing will be May 1st. Hybrid cloud deployments offer the promise of endless resources to assure application performance without wasting money on needless compute, storage or network. Multiple vendors now offer solutions to ease the adoption of a hybrid cloud model. With these advances and the ability to choose between a local data center and multiple public cloud offerings, one fundamental question must still be answered: What, when and where to run workloads to assure performance while maximizing efficiency? Click below to see if you can solve this problem, and be entered to win a VMTurbo TurboStack home lab. <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=04082016]]> Enter for a chance to win! VMTurboStack Homelab Valued over USD $1300. What's in the VMTurboStack Home Lab?
- (1) Intel NUC NUC5i5RYK
- (2) Crucial 8GB DDR3 RAM
- (1) Synology DS415 4-Bay NAS
- (1) Samsung 850 EVO 250GB SATA III TLC Internal Solid State Drive
- (2) Western Digital 1TB 3.5â€³ SATA Drives
- (1) Cisco SG300 10-Port Gigabit Managed Switch
- (3) Ethernet Cables
-The VMTurbo Team
